title: The Networks Aim to Make TV Great Again, and Previewing 'Twin Peaks' (Ep. 151)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald discuss network television’s recent attempts to eventize television programming (1:00). They also say farewell to Soundgarden and Audioslave frontman Chris Cornell (13:20) before discussing the upcoming third season of 'Twin Peaks' (21:20).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
